governor_profile.angelic_role: Throne of Herald of Sacred Names; marshals storm-winged heralds.
governor_profile.essence: In DOCEPAX's presence, every deed finds its true name this discerning herald crowns each act with a resonant, legendary title.

form.name: crystalline
form.description: A prismatic, multi-faceted geometric form that shifts between angular justice-scales and flame-like dynamic structures, representing the interplay of discernment and transformative fire energy

color.reasoning: Crimson represents Fire element's passion, while gold symbolizes divine wisdom and herald's transformative power; shifting pattern reflects Libran balance and dynamic justice

geometry.reasoning: Octahedron represents perfect equilibrium, flame-spiral embodies transformative energy, justice-scale signifies divine discernment

environment.reasoning: Reflects ZIM Aethyr's storm-like revelatory energy and DOCEPAX's role as cosmic herald

time_variations.reasoning: Represents eternal process of divine naming and cosmic ordering

energy_signature.reasoning: Fire's dynamic energy combined with herald's transformative power

symbol_set.reasoning: Symbols representing naming power, storm revelation, and transformative movement

light_shadow.reasoning: Reveals hidden truths while maintaining enigmatic depths

special_properties.reasoning: Embodies ability to define essence through sacred naming and cosmic discernment

governor_profile.name: DOCEPAX
governor_profile.title: 'He who names only great names'
